alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 8:26PM AKST until December 03 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow occuring with freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 3 inches. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch of ice. * WHERE...Middle Tanana Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Driving and walking surface will become very slippery. Up to one tenth of an inch of ice will form on top of the snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is occuring with brief periods of freezing rain this evening. The snow is expected to mix with freezing rain about midnight, with snow changing over to mainly freezing rain early Saturday morning. Freezing rain should taper off Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
